parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240002) at the end.  This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for campaign finance reporting and are mandated for political advertising.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>While the post doesn't explicitly name parliamentary candidates, it promotes a team (#EchipaValeriuIftime) associated with the PNL (Partidul Național Liberal) in Leorda. The image shows individuals clearly affiliated with the PNL, further strengthening this connection.  This indirectly refers to candidates running under the PNL banner in the local elections, even if not explicitly named.  Article 36 (7) - a could potentially apply depending on the interpretation of "directly refers".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. It's not a private message; it's public and aims for broad dissemination. Therefore, it addresses the wide population.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voting for the #EchipaValeriuIftime, which is strongly associated with the PNL in Leorda. The visual element (image) further reinforces this message. The explicit mention of the team and the use of a hashtag clearly aim to influence voting behavior.  Article 36 (7) - c applies.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's not presenting news or analysis; it's promotional material explicitly endorsing a specific political team. It does not adhere to journalistic standards of impartiality and factual reporting.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>This is not a personal opinion; it's a coordinated campaign effort by the PNL Leorda branch to promote their candidates. The content is not an expression of personal views but a clear attempt at electoral influence.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1032187598679458</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post, a paid Facebook advertisement, contains a CMF number, directly links to the PNL party through imagery and text, and explicitly promotes a team of candidates.  The objective is clearly to influence voters in favor of the PNL in Leorda. While it doesn't name specific parliamentary candidates, the strong association with the PNL and the clear intent to influence voting behavior make it electoral propaganda. The timing of the post (after the parliamentary election period) is not specified in the provided data, but if it falls outside the allowed period, it would be a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Valeriu Iftime (and other members of #EchipaValeriuIftime)</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Partidul Național Liberal - filiala Botoșani, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 1032187598679458) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează echipa #EchipaValeriuIftime, puternic asociată cu PNL Leorda, prin imagini și text, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea candidaților PNL din Leorda. Prezența numărului CMF 11240002 confirmă natura electorală a postării.  Conținutul postării, lipsit de obiectivitate jurnalistică și cu scopul clar de a influența votul, îndeplinește toate criteriile pentru a fi considerată propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
